properties.description: Ce pipeline a pour but de copier les donn√©es de csv vers parquet puis le mettre dedicated SQL pool

activities.name: copy table sql to dedicated Pool

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
hd.[SalesOrderID],hd.[OrderDate],hd.[CustomerID],hd.[SubTotal],hd.[TaxAmt],hd.[Freight],hd.[TotalDue],
dt.[OrderQty],dt.[ProductID],dt.[UnitPrice],dt.[UnitPriceDiscount],dt.[LineTotal]
FROM [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] hd INNER JOIN [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] dt
ON hd.[SalesOrderID]=dt.[SalesOrderID]

activities.name: managed identity using job cluster without interacting
Get a list of table to be prcessed

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select quotename(t.name) as tableName,quotename(schema_name(t.schema_id)) as schemaName
from sys.tables as t

dependsOn.activity: Get a list of table to be prcessed

items.value: @activity('Get a list of table to be prcessed').output.value

DedicatedSql Pool copy csv from adf

folderPath.value:
@concat(
    dataset().ServerName,
    '/',
    dataset().DabaseName,
    '/',
    dataset().TableName,
    '/Year=',
    formatDateTime(utcnow(),'yyyy'),
    '/Month=',
    formatDateTime(utcnow(),'MM'),
    '/Day=',
    formatDateTime(utcnow(),'dd')
)
